gpt_desc: Start a new conversation with gpt-4-turbo, 128k
gpt4_desc: Start a new conversation with gpt-4o, 128k
gpt_prompt_desc: Question, sentence, or any input. To attach files/images, use !gpt command instead
gpt4_prompt_desc: Question, sentence, or any input. To attach files/images, use !gpt4 command instead
gptinit_desc: Setup your template prompt, applies on every new conversation. Leave blank or no parameter to clear
gptinit_prompt_desc: Blank or don't send this parameter to clear prompt
gptinit_changed: Your GPT init prompt has been changed!
